Evaluation of predicted annotations (aerophilicity)

Source: vignettes/articles/evaluation.Rmd
evaluation.Rmd
library(bugphyzzAnalyses)
library(bugphyzz)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)
library(pROC)

Definition of TP, TN, FP, FN 

## 0.5 = sometimes
## 1 = always
## 0 = unknown
data <- tribble(
    ~ NCBI_ID, ~ Attribute, ~ test_score, ~ predicted_score, ~ test_value, ~ predicted_value, ~ label,
    '1', 'Aerobic', 0.5, 0.5, 1, 1, "TP",
    '1', 'Anaerobic', 0.5, 0, 1, 0, "FN",
    '1', 'Facultatibe anaerobic', 0, 0, 0, 0, "TN",
    '1', 'Aerotolerant', 0, 0.5, 0, 1, 'FP'
)
knitr::kable(data, caption = 'Example with a threshold of 0.5 (sometimes)')
Example with a threshold of 0.5 (sometimes)
NCBI_ID Attribute test_score predicted_score test_value predicted_value label
1 Aerobic 0.5 0.5 1 1 TP
1 Anaerobic 0.5 0.0 1 0 FN
1 Facultatibe anaerobic 0.0 0.0 0 0 TN
1 Aerotolerant 0.0 0.5 0 1 FP

Import test set

link <- 'https://github.com/sdgamboa/bugphyzzExportsPerformance/raw/rep1/test_set.csv.bz2'
fname <- tempfile()
download.file(url = link, destfile = fname)
test <- read.csv(fname)
test$NCBI_ID <- sub('^.__', '', test$NCBI_ID)
test_aer <- filter(test, Attribute_group == 'aerophilicity')
knitr::kable(count(test_aer, Evidence), caption = 'Evidence of the test set')
Evidence of the test set
Evidence n
exp 1139
igc 347
nas 287
tas 1130

Import predicted set

link <- 'https://github.com/sdgamboa/bugphyzzExportsPerformance/raw/rep1/full_dump_categorical.csv.bz2'
fname <- tempfile()
download.file(url = link, destfile = fname)
bp <- read.csv(fname)
predicted_aer <- filter(bp, Attribute_group == 'aerophilicity')
predicted_aer |> 
  filter(NCBI_ID %in% unique(test_aer$NCBI_ID)) |> 
  count(Evidence) |> 
  knitr::kable(caption = 'Evidence of the predicted set')
Evidence of the predicted set
Evidence n
asr 2422
exp 1
inh 7952

Percentage of NCBI_IDs in the test set that were predicted

paste0(mean(test_aer$NCBI_ID %in% predicted_aer$NCBI_ID) * 100, "%")
#> [1] "91.284877712711%"

Test set:

## get test set
test_set <- test_aer |> 
    select(NCBI_ID, Attribute, Frequency) |> 
    arrange(NCBI_ID) |> 
    unique() |> 
    pivot_wider(
        names_from = 'Attribute', values_from = 'Frequency',
        values_fill = 'unknown'
    ) |> 
    mutate(aerotolerant = 'unknown') |> 
    pivot_longer(
        cols = 2:last_col(), names_to = 'Attribute', values_to = 'Frequency'
    ) |> 
    rename(t_freq = Frequency)

## get predicted set
predicted_set <- predicted_aer |> 
    select(NCBI_ID, Attribute, Frequency) |> 
    arrange(NCBI_ID) |> 
    unique() |> 
    rename(p_freq = Frequency) |> 
    mutate(NCBI_ID = as.character(NCBI_ID)) |> 
    mutate(Attribute = sub('^.*:', '', Attribute)) |> 
    mutate(Attribute = sub('_', ' ', Attribute))

result <- left_join(test_set, predicted_set, by = c('NCBI_ID', 'Attribute')) |> 
    mutate(p_freq = ifelse(is.na(p_freq), 'unknown', p_freq))

Thresholds

Threshold 0.5 (sometimes) and above 

sometimes_freqs <- c('always', 'usually', 'sometimes')
sometimes <- result |> 
    mutate(
        t_val = ifelse(t_freq %in% sometimes_freqs, 1, 0),
        p_val = ifelse(p_freq %in% sometimes_freqs, 1, 0),
        label = case_when(
            t_val == 1 & p_val == 1 ~ 'TP',
            t_val == 1 & p_val == 0 ~ 'FN',
            t_val == 0 & p_val == 0 ~ 'TN',
            t_val == 0 & p_val == 1 ~ 'FP'
        )
    )
knitr::kable(count(sometimes, label), caption = 'Counts of TP, TN, FP, FN')
Counts of TP, TN, FP, FN
label n
FN 580
FP 415
TN 8067
TP 2323

stats:

knitr::kable(calcPredStats(sometimes))
stat value
sensitivity (recall) 0.8002067
specificity 0.9510729
precision 0.8484295
FDR 0.1515705
FPR 0.0489271

AUC:

roc(sometimes$t_val, sometimes$p_val)
#> 
#> Call:
#> roc.default(response = sometimes$t_val, predictor = sometimes$p_val)
#> 
#> Data: sometimes$p_val in 8482 controls (sometimes$t_val 0) < 2903 cases (sometimes$t_val 1).
#> Area under the curve: 0.8756

ROC plot:

plot.roc(sometimes$t_val, sometimes$p_val)

Threshold 0.8 (usually) and above 

usually_freqs <- c('always', 'usually')
usually <- result |> 
    mutate(
        t_val = ifelse(t_freq %in% usually_freqs, 1, 0),
        p_val = ifelse(p_freq %in% usually_freqs, 1, 0),
        label = case_when(
            t_val == 1 & p_val == 1 ~ 'TP',
            t_val == 1 & p_val == 0 ~ 'FN',
            t_val == 0 & p_val == 0 ~ 'TN',
            t_val == 0 & p_val == 1 ~ 'FP'
        )
    )
knitr::kable(count(usually, label), caption = 'Counts of TP, TN, FP, FN')
Counts of TP, TN, FP, FN
label n
FN 779
FP 245
TN 8249
TP 2112

Threshold 1 (always) 

always <- result |> 
    mutate(
        t_val = ifelse(t_freq == 'always', 1, 0),
        p_val = ifelse(p_freq == 'always', 1, 0),
        label = case_when(
            t_val == 1 & p_val == 1 ~ 'TP',
            t_val == 1 & p_val == 0 ~ 'FN',
            t_val == 0 & p_val == 0 ~ 'TN',
            t_val == 0 & p_val == 1 ~ 'FP'
        )
    )
knitr::kable(count(always, label), caption = 'Counts of TP, TN, FP, FN')

FP 217

TP 1837
